lead_paragraph: A judge reaffirmed the ruling ahead of a scheduled trial in a mental capacity suit filed by Manuela Herzer, the ailing media mogul’s former companion.

byline.original: By EMILY STEEL and NOAH SMITH

headline.print_headline: Sumner Redstone Won’t Have to Give Deposition in Lawsuit
headline.main: Sumner Redstone Won’t Have to Give Deposition in Competency Suit

snippet: A judge reaffirmed the ruling ahead of a scheduled trial in a mental capacity suit filed by Manuela Herzer, the ailing media mogul’s former companion.
abstract: Superior Court Judge David J Cowan of Los Angeles rules Viacom and CBS chairman Sumner M Redstone will not be required to sit for deposition in legal tussle over his mental competency; suit was filed by former companion Manuela Herzer.
